featured.text: In the early 1990s, however, scientists noticed that synesthetic colors do not change over time.
When asked what color is evoked by a letter or number, synesthetic people would persistently give the same answer even if tested months or years apart.

definition.zh_def: 具有聯覺特徵的，指一種感官刺激引發另一種感官體驗的現象。
definition.en_def: Relating to or denoting a condition in which one sense is simultaneously perceived as if by one or more additional senses.
definition.example: She has a synesthetic experience where she sees colors when she hears music.
